title: SOLD: FS T206 Fred Clarke(Bat) Sovereign PSA 4
author: Cy2009

posts.post_title: SOLD: FS T206 Fred Clarke(Bat) Sovereign PSA 4
posts.post_content:
The card is SOLD.

Hi,

I have for sale a T206 Fred Clarke (with Bat). It has a Sovereign back and is graded PSA 4 This is a very nice card. 

I am asking $ 230 for the card. I prefer to be paid with a US Postal money order. But if that is a problem, I will accept PayPal or a check.

If you would like to buy it, you can contact me at: [url]cy@cyscards.com[/url]

[IMG]http://www.cyscards.com/t206/picsb/06-090b.jpg[/IMG][IMG]http://www.cyscards.com/t206/picsb/06-090rb.jpg[/IMG]

Thanks.

Cy
